vote.title: Authorize a three-year sole source services agreement for a cloud-based CJIS compliant software solution for managing law enforcement interactions, Case Closed, for the Dallas Police Department - Crime Tech Solutions, LLC, sole source - Not to exceed $271,244.50 - Financing: FY21 Bureau of Justice Assistance Grant Fund ($85,901.07) and General Fund ($185,343.43) (subject to annual appropriations)
